channel.title: Docker on Vcvc Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Vcvc Blog

item.title: Docker use Tutorial
item.description: Install docker apt-get remove docker docker-engine docker.io containerd runc curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - apt-key fingerprint 0EBF**** add-apt-repository \ "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu \ bionic \ stable" apt-get install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io # https://www.daocloud.io/mirror curl -sSL https://get.daocloud.io/daotools/set_mirror.sh | sh -s http://f1361db2.m.daocloud.io docker run hello-world Compose https://gitee.com/xipushi/dockercompose.git chmod +x docker-compose-Linux-x86_64 mv docker-compose-Linux-x86_64 docker-compose cp /use/local/bin docker-compose --version Dockerfile # from based nginx # run start FROM nginx # exec: RUN[".
